name: Crazy Rocket
description:
Crazy rocket is a physics based game where your goal is to fly your rocket trough obstacles, complete levels and missions, and explore the space.

Different game modes:

Currently, there are 3 different game modes in the game, each with it's own variants

  1. Campaign - Currently only consists of 5 levels (The tutorial), but will have more when the game is out of beta.
  2. Endless mode - It's very obvious, you go as far as you can. Has 3 variants:
    1. Rocket Labs (Normal endless mode)
    2. Hardcore mode (Normal mode, no HP recharge)
    3. Impossible mode (Only the hardest obstacles)
  3. Space missions - Explore the space while completing missions for rewards.

Customizations:

Fully customize your rocket by painting each part of the rocket the color you want. You can paint the rocket's parts in 65 different colors, the body of the rocket in 52 different colors, and choose a boost color from 12 different colored boosts.

Other features:

  • Upgrades
  • Power-ups
  • Simple controls
  • Mouse and touch support
  • Achievements
  • Statistics
